title: Atonement
overview: At a class reunion, Qin Suyan is drawn into a deadly game where players face ruthless rules, real danger, and growing distrustâ€”especially with the mastermind hiding among them. As others give in to fear and violence, Qin Suyan holds on to her compassion. While uncovering a connection to a long-buried case, she must decide whether revealing the truth is worth the cost.
